component.name: Densify
component.summary: GTK4 GUI Wrapper for Compressing PDF Files with GhostScript

description.p: A GTK4 GUI Wrapper written in Python that simplifies compressing PDF files with Ghostscript.
While most distros will have GhostScript installed by default, if it's not already installed, you must first have it installed on your system or else this wrapper will not work.
It essentially takes your GUI input and turns it into a Ghostscript command to compress your PDF with various quality settings: screen, ebook, printer, prepress, or default.
This utility is produced by 3DF Open Source Initiative (OSI) and sponsored by 3DF Limited.
Fixed invalid application ID causing AppImage to to not pass appimage.github.io test
